title: As a Main Jungler This bothers me A LOT
body:
I've had these scenarios before, but it bothers me more than ever.

So Picture this, you are already 8 kills participation, ahead in everything and you should be doing well right?

Nope, their jungle who haven't left the jungle this whole time is now 3 levels ahead of you. Because Logic.

I don't understand why it's even required to gank if you fall behind 2-3 levels while consistently following your routes. It makes no sense.

replies.body: That isn't even remotely possible unless you are sitting potato in the river for huge chunks of time.
I can make a video out of the match. This is Diamond elo match.

1. Farm Efficiency
2. AFK Farming > Farm and Gank (For XP)

You're not doing anything wrong imo, it's just the enemy jungler is much more efficient than you at taking out camps and invading your camps, thought you should know.

replies.poster: x R e n g a R x
replies.body:
You're doing something wrong that's why. 

I'd look at some tips on youtube.
